name: TrueAchievements Circular Gamerpics
description: The Xbox One now displays gamerpics as a circle. This style rounds off elements with gamerpics to bring that same behavior over to TA.
additional_info:
This is super simple. It literally just applies a 
border-radius
to specific elements. Please let me know if I've missed any particular area.
css:
@-moz-document domain("www.trueachievements.com") {
td.author>a.ih,
div.gamerimage>a.ih,
td.author>a.ih>img.bigicon,
div.gamerimage>a.ih>img.bigicon,
li#mnuMyPages>a.level1>img,
td.gamerpic>img,
div.gamericon>a.ih,
div.gamericon>a.ih>img.bigicon,
div.gamerpanel div.ih,
div.gamerpanel div.ih>img.bigicon,
div.friendfeeditem>a:first-of-type>img.smallicon,
div.Comment>a>img.smallicon,
td.gamerthumb>a>img,
div.hovercard>div.gamer>div.image>img.bigicon {
	border-radius: 50%;
}
}
